saying: There is such a thing as love at first sight.
description: Bianca is a peppy tiger villager in the Animal Crossing series, first appearing in Animal Crossing: New Leaf. Bianca, alongside Claudia, is notably the first female tiger since Bangle to appear in an Animal Crossing series title, also sharing Bangle's Peppy personality. Bianca's name is Italian for “white”, referring to the color of her fur. It is also the Japanese name of a snooty wolf villager and the German name of a snooty cat villager.
